attributes.action: Enable University Students to Pay off their student Loan in lump sums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment university leavers are only able to pay back the student loan monthly with a set rate of interest.
We believe that you should be able to pay off your student loan in lump payments if you wish.
If you inherit money or a family member decided to pay off your loan the university leaver should be able to pay off that amount of the loan. it will help cut down the amount of interest they are getting.
The government need more DR’s, Psychologists, Professors, and Teachers etc and at the same time expect them to get into debt and pay interest on becoming better educated.
